title: On the Town
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, United Artists Corporation, Arthur Freed, Gene Kelly and Stanley Donen
brief_description: A great musical comedy which is given full treatment with fine singing and dancing. It is the story of three sailors and their girls. Starring Gene Kelly, Ann Miller and Frank Sinatra.
